tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wildlife_protection_areas (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 area_name TEXT,
 location TEXT,
 species_population JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE population_data (
    area_id INT,
    year INT,
    species VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    population_count INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (area_id, year, species),
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES wildlife_protection_areas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE wildlife_population (
    population_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_id INT,
    species VARCHAR(100),
    population_size INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE wildlife_protection_areas (
  area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  area_size FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE species (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE population_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_id INT NOT NULL,
  species_id INT NOT NULL,
  population_count INT NOT NULL,
  observation_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE park_rangers (
  ranger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ranger_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  area_id INT NOT NULL,
  hire_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE population_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  area_id INT,
  population_size BIGINT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);
